rule.change: Field @target has been renamed to @new_value.
rule.effect: Recompilation of a client program may be broken with the error message: @type_type @type_name has no member named @target.

rule.change: Type of field @target has been changed from @old_value to @new_value.
rule.effect: Recompilation of a client program may be broken.

rule.change: Pure virtual method @target has been added to this class.
rule.effect: Recompilation of a client program may be broken with the error message: cannot allocate an object of abstract type @type_name because the following virtual functions are pure within @type_name: virtual @target.

rule.change: Pure_Virtual method @target has been removed from this class.
rule.effect: Recompilation of a client program may be broken.

rule.change: Virtual method @old_value has been overridden by @new_value.
rule.effect: Method @new_value will be called after recompilation instead of @old_value.
